reviews.review_text:
Our usual Saturday night dining with friends took us to this place due to good reviews and images of food on social media...but oh boy...we were thoroughly dissapointed.

The place looks charming at first from outside.

We ordered many dishes after taking recomendation from our server.

The food is something we will not be going there for second time. Below mediocre ..no taste...mostly things dumped in spices and cooked ..

For starters.. we had french fries( good item on the menu.. seriously)...cheese garlic naan which was standard and butter garlic squids which carried hint of fishiness ..

We then ordered chicken basil which was only  4 star item on the menu.

The orrad kebab( or whatever was it's name) was lacking taste..just spiciness and raw spice taste overwhelming you.

We patiently waited for green masala stuffed bangde( mackerels)..our bar was very high as we have had delicious bharille bangde in another restaurant in Panaji.Sadly these bangdes we fried rechado style( without rava) and the green masala inside was lackluster..the bangdes were fresh though.

Then some tawa fried chicken which was very spicy.( Disappointing)

Vegetarian options were less . The paneer dish was sub standard and the mushroom tikka was thumbs down.not at all cooked properly..the veg biryani was too spicy with whole spices spoiling every spoon of the dish.

The egg fried rice was surprisingly good compared to the dissapointing things we had ordered earlier.

The drinks- kokum soda and lime soda were okayish and lit was substandard.

We skipped desserts as options were few and we did not want to spoil the mast meal of the day so we went to another place.

The place looks good from outside but needs some renovation where there are water seepages on the walls and specially in the washroom area.

Request to the owner to please change your chef/ cook .

The serving staff were quick but they need a little polishing and better uniforms .

We will not be going there again.

Orrad is a perfect combination of everything that a restaurant must have - good food, drinks and even the musicians are super entertaining. But what makes this place really standout is itâ€™s interiors. The bright walls with a mix of modern and and a few hints of heritage decor make this restaurant truly Instagrammable. Personally we were a fan of everything we ordered from cheese balls and kebabs to chicken gravy and noodles. Even the desserts are on point. We definitely recommend visiting this joint.

The food is lovely!
All the dishes we tried were good.
Loved the Butter garlic squids! They were really good.. They're served with assorted veges and fries.
Their Special Kebab is a must try!

The restaurant is located in Caranzalem, just a kilometer away from the Miramar beach.
The restraunt is newly renovated and done up well. The new place has got pretty interiors.
